creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: four tall buildings in the forms of numbers 1, 2, 3, and 4, with rows and columns of square windows; bright blue sky; four people walking from right to left in front of buildings including (from left) a man in orange, a woman in yellow with a pocketbook and tall yellow hat, a child in orange with an orange balloon, and a stooped figure with a can dressed in orange; mounted on a white sheet affixed to backing mount board
medium: Ink and colored pencil (?) on paper
